reviews.review_msg: I wish I can rate this prof with a Zero. It's baffling how someone who is an adult does not know how to show respect to others. Yells and swears at students. He CANNOT teach. Needs to go back in time to get smacked by his mom so he can learn some human decency.  I'm so sick of his patronizing attitude. Thank god there  are only two labs left.

Awesome teacher and mentor. Is German so we all know he's good. Midterms are long and hard (thats what she said) usually not possible to finish in 50min. He gave me two A+ hella boosted my gpa. His most important lecture is the one with the red dot. Office hours is where I learned the most.
